name: Wandergarden
description:
As a fresh newborn you leap into the world of the gardens to find out about your existence.

A long lost brothers heartbeat dwells your mind as you enter the home of another. Frightened, no clue what's going on, only silence.

Controls

  • M to mute audio
  • F1 to toggle fullscreen

Keyboard:

  • Arrow keys to move
  • Up key to jump
  • Z or Y to interact

Gamepad: (Recommended Xbox 360 controller)

  • DPAD or Left Joystick to move
  • A to jump
  • X to interact

Game by: @Noxlof
Special Thanks to: @mylesvice

Inspired by Cactus
